relnotes.name: SMS MTM
relnotes.purpose: Message Type Module (MTM) plugin to Messaging Framework, supporting sending/receiving/editing of SMS messages.

defect.title: Bell Mobility Canada -GSM/WCDMA -OTC-SMS-MO-to invalid destination is retried

relnotes.defect: Checking for the error codes to avoid sending messages to invlaid numbers.

defect.title: smcm.dll contains ABSENT symbols

relnotes.defect: declared classes as non sharable classes

defect.title: [Coverity]:SYMBIAN.CLEANUP_STACK checker error

relnotes.defect: Fix for coverity errors.

defect.title: Messaging can not be launched and MTMInit is closed is detected when restarting the phone

relnotes.defect: Specific commsdat version is uesed instead of CMDBSession::LatestVersion

defect.title: AT&T Any Message Delivering to unknown port Deletion

relnotes.defect: Introduced two new APIs in CSmsSettings class to set the "Discard UnknownPort Message" flag.

defect.title: cannot create SMS through techview on NE1 and NE1S

relnotes.defect: CreateHeaderTableL() requires client application to have Write Device Data capability. The function was called inappropriately.

deliverystep.name: Store Message content in SQL
deliverystep.preq: Migration of Email and SMS headers to SQL.

deliverystep.name: Splitting mixed header files for Messaging

preq.title: Splitting mixed header files for Messaging

deliverystep.preq: Mixed header files will now contain only published All or published Partner or internal

defect.title: [StrayScanner]CSmsSimParamOperation potential for E32USER-CBase 46

relnotes.defect: resolved stray event posibility for CSmsSimParamOperation constructor.

defect.title: EUpsDecSessionYes is not handled by SMS MTM

relnotes.defect: EUpsDecYes and EUpsDecSessionYes is now handled in SMS server mtm.

defect.title: SMS sending sometimes fails the wrong message

relnotes.defect: Added a condition to check the scenario when one of the sms is locked.

defect.title: SMS messages not sent when are prepared directly in the outbox

relnotes.defect: Added a condition to check if SMS is in preparation

defect.title: Array out of bounds panic in SMS server mtm

relnotes.defect: Added a condition to check boundary condition

defect.title: @prototype tags in messaging

relnotes.defect: Add proper Im tag.

defect.title: Many (simple) syntax errors in messaging code

relnotes.defect: Removed the class prefix to the operator and constructor functions.

defect.title: leaked handles in msvserver

relnotes.defect: Closed RThread handle to avoid leak

deliverystep.name: Messaging: New advanced APIs for searching and sorting for Message store

preq.title: Enhanced search capabilities for message store

deliverystep.preq: For supportong new advanced APIs for searching and sorting for Message store, changes done in CSmsClientMtm::FindL

defect.title: TMsvSmsEntry class has incorrect Doxygen tags

relnotes.defect: Corrected Doxygen tags for TMsvSmsEntry class.

defect.title: smuthdr.h - Function not deprecated which should be deprecated

relnotes.defect: Added tags for SMUTHDR.H file.

deliverystep.name: Messaging: Unicode / Binary encoding for SMS in SendAs

defect.title: Messaging: Crash note 'Application closed:Main!' pops up after deleting the only

relnotes.defect: Phone has to return message main menu without crash.for that added condition

defect.title: V and V Ricardo: sms with v-card

relnotes.defect: CWapRecipientSend have to generate a log ID for receiving delivery reports.

defect.title: SendAs2ExampleClient doesnt seem to work as expected after an API change

relnotes.defect: The iSmsHeader.Recipient.Count, value was not getting incremented, if multiple recipient were added to the message.

defect.title: st_messaging_cdmasms fails with Progress Error:-40

relnotes.defect: The message already contains BEGIN:VCARD so,do not insert this text again.

defect.title: Filename Policy non-conformance generates warnings in checksource build

relnotes.defect: Replaced the #ifdef WINS with #ifdef WINSCW

defect.title: Documentation for KSmcmSmsNumberMaxNumberLength refers to nonexistent functions

relnotes.defect: Edited the documentation for KSmcmSmsNumberMaxNumberLength.

defect.title: Wrong function referred to in TSmsMtmCommand

relnotes.defect: Edited the documentation for TSmsMtmCommand.

defect.title: SMS reception broken due to exception in TSmsUtilities::DoGetDetailsL

relnotes.defect: Need to check if the first and given name of the contact is greater than the MaxLength and set the pointer to MaxLength.

defect.title: Wrong text in Confirm delete dialog when deleting from Draft and Sent

relnotes.defect: Needs to check whether there is any data in the body before setting iDescription to the contents.

defect.title: Warnings generated with checksource build

relnotes.defect: Added condition to differentiate the winscw and armv5 def files for case sensitive

defect.title: Klocwork errors: messaging_sms_multimode

relnotes.defect: Increased the size of the CSmsNumber::iAckInfo array such that it can be indexed by all the values in the TSmsAckType enumeration.

deliverystep.name: Implemented user prompting while sending/recieving the messages
Messaging file name changes to support GNU compiler for Linux

defect.title: Add missing IM tags to Messaging public header files

relnotes.defect: Added IM tag for all given header files.

defect.title: ServerMTM statemachine problem.

relnotes.defect: Don't attempt to resend an SMS if the send fails with a GSM operation not allowed error code

defect.title: SMS that has failed to be sent to some recipients are not saved

relnotes.defect: SMS saved even if send to some recipients has failed

defect.title: Messaging SMS tests failing due to use of deprecated CommDB APIs

relnotes.defect: Change method of accessing modem bearer record in CommDB database to remove use of API combination which is no longer supported
